resources.string:
There are two ways this app allows your to wirelessly fingerprint and environment: 
 - Grid method: a grid is overlayed on the map, and the user must fingerprint all possible locations within the building. 
 - Placement method: the user can place fingerprint points in any mapBitmap they desire on the map, and place as many as they like.
The Location permission MUST be granted for the app to function. Please press to grant.
Changes will be saved when you press back, or exit the application.
